notes:
Sets 10 stacks to a player who stands directly next to it. The stacks will cause damage over time to the player, each damage decreasing the number of stacks by one.

In case the player with stacks get hit by one of the bosses' beam, all stacks deal damage to the player at once and the number of stacks is set to zero.

It is summoned by [[Vemiath]], [[Chagorz]] and [[Bakragore]].
name: Pillar of Dark Energy
